gurmukhi: iek BUpiq TwiF rhXo rx mYN ]gih hwQ gdw inrBY mn mY ]10]
transliteration: Ik Bhoopat(i) Thaadh(i) Rahyo Ran Main|| Gad(i) Haath Gadaa Nirbhai Man Mai||10||
translation: Only the Emperor, fearlessly holding his mace in his hand, stood firmly in that battlefield.10.

gurmukhi: lrjy sB sUr niRp grjy ]smuhwq Bey Bt kyhr ky ]
transliteration: Larje Sabh Soor Nripan Gadje|| Samuhaat Bhae Bhat Kehar Ke||
translation: When the Emperor roared loudly, then all the brave warriors trembled and all those warriors came forward in groups before that lion.

gurmukhi: ju gey smuhy iCq qY ptky ]rx qy rx DIr btw nt ky ]11]
transliteration: Ju Gad Samuhe Chit Tai Patke|| Ran Te Ran Dheer Bataa Nat Ke||11||
translation: All those who went in front of Narsingh, He caught hold of all those warriors like a juggler and knocked them down of the ground.11.

gurmukhi: bbky rx DIr subIr Gxy ]rihgy mno ikMsk sRox sxy ]
transliteration: Babke Ran Dheer Soubnr Ghane|| Raihge Mano Kinsak Sron Sane||
translation: The warriors shouted loudly at one another and saturated with blood began to fall.

gurmukhi: aumgy chUM Ern qy irp XoN ]brswq bhwrn ABRn jXoN ]12]
transliteration: Oumge Chahoon Oran Te Rip Yon|| Barsaat Bahaaran Abhran Jyon||12
translation: The enemies advanced from all the four sides with such intensity like the clouds in the rainy season.12.

gurmukhi: brKy sr su`iD islw isqXM ]aumfy br bIr dso idsXM ]
transliteration: Barkhe Sar Sudhh(i) Silaa Sityan|| Oumde Bar Beer Daso Disyan||
translation: Advancing from all the ten directions, the warriors began to shower the arrows and stones;

gurmukhi: cmkMq kiRpwx su bwx juDM ]PhrMq Dujw jnu bIr kRuDM ]13]
transliteration: Chamkant Kirpaan Su Baan Judhan|| Phahrant Dhujaa Jan(u) Beer Krudhan||13||
translation: The swords and arrows glistened in the war-field and the brave fighters began to flutter their flags.13.
The persistent warriors with loud shouts are showering a volley of arrows in this way,
As if it is the second cloudburst in the mont of Swan;
The flags are fluttering and the horses are neighing;
